name: cts_corp_portfolio_website
description: webpack with stylelint config. Updated on 28.2.2022
author: Riganti s.r.o.

scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:css && npm run build-prod
scripts.bundle:css: npm run stylelint && npm run bundle:home.css && npm run bundle:management.css
scripts.bundle:home.css: npm run compile:home.scss && postcss wwwroot/css/home.css --config ./postcss.config.js | cleancss -o wwwroot/css/home.min.css
scripts.bundle:management.css: npm run compile:management.scss && postcss wwwroot/css/management.css --config ./postcss.config.js | cleancss -o wwwroot/css/management.min.css
scripts.compile:scss: npm run compile:home.scss && npm run compile:management.scss
scripts.watch:scss: npm run bundle:css & watch "npm run bundle:css" Resources/Stylesheets/Scss
